name: gulp-simple-inject
description: Gulp plugin for injecting JS and CSS file references into html files.

scripts.test: node node_modules/if-env/bin/if-env.js TRAVIS=1 && npm run test:travis || npm run test:local
scripts.test:travis: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover -x spec/** node_modules/jasmine-node/bin/jasmine-node --captureExceptions spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | node node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf coverage

author: Ryan Helmoski
